casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terrance BOWMAN. No. 142A97-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Seth A. Blum, Raleigh, for Bowman. Ralf F. Haskell, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of September 2004 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
